name: PlayMediaControl
desc: A configuration for permitted user interactions and other player behaviors during playback.

items.name: scheme
items.desc: The base set of user controls to make available, and related content behaviors to use.

items.name: commands
items.desc: A set of commands and their desired availabilities to override the default behavior of the scheme.

items.name: activity
items.desc: A schedule for the client to report playback progress to the Report Playback Progress and Activity endpoint.
